heading: HB05889
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A NATIONAL HIGHWAY FROM LANAO DEL NORTE INTERIOR CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF TAGOLOAN, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE TO THE MUNICIPALITY OF TALAKAG, PROVINCE OF BUKIDNON, WITH A CROSSROAD AT BARANGAY MALIMBATO, MUNICIPALITY OF TAGOLOAN, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE AND CONNECTING ROADS TO THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY IN ILIGAN CITY THROUGH BARANGAY PUGAAN, ILIGAN CITY AND TO THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY IN MARAWI CITY THROUGH THE MUNICIPALITY OF KAPAI, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL SUR, TO BE KNOWN AS THE MUSLIM-CHRISTIAN UNITY HIGHWAY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title: Providing For The Construction Of A National Highway From Lanao Del Norte Interior Circumferential Road In The Municipality Of Tagoloan, Province Of Lanao Del Norte To The Municipality Of Talakag, Province Of Bukidnon, With A Crossroad At Barangay Malimbato, Municipality Of Tagoloan, Province Of Lanao Del Norte And Connecting Roads To The National Highway In Iligan City Through Barangay Pugaan, Iligan City And To The National Highway In Marawi City Through The Municipality Of Kapai, Province Of Lanao Del Sur, To Be Known As The Muslim-christian Unity Highway
principal-authors: DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.; DIMAPORO, ABDULLAH D.; ACOSTA-ALBA, MA. LOURDES; SIAO, FREDERICK W.; MADRONA. ELEANDRO JESUS F.; UNGAB, ISIDRO T.;
status: Approved by the House on 2020-02-26, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-02-27 and received by the Senate on 2020-02-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05889
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A NATIONAL HIGHWAY FROM LANAO DEL NORTE INTERIOR CIRCUMFERENTIAL ROAD IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF TAGOLOAN, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE TO THE MUNICIPALITY OF TALAKAG, PROVINCE OF BUKIDNON, WITH A CROSSROAD AT BARANGAY MALIMBATO, MUNICIPALITY OF TAGOLOAN, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL NORTE AND CONNECTING ROADS TO THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY IN ILIGAN CITY THROUGH BARANGAY PUGAAN, ILIGAN CITY AND TO THE NATIONAL HIGHWAY IN MARAWI CITY THROUGH THE MUNICIPALITY OF KAPAI, PROVINCE OF LANAO DEL SUR, TO BE KNOWN AS THE MUSLIM-CHRISTIAN UNITY HIGHWAY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
